name: Hydra
overview: Hydra is a 1-player arcade game for the 8-bit Atari. For two months the city has been under surveillance. Not by neighboring police or an enemy country, but by hostile aliens. They've already kidnapped children from the streets, and have now returned to pillage again. The player controls a crosshair, and tries to shoot incoming alien vessels while trying to protect their city at the bottom of the screen.
